Title: Exceptionally Rare 18K White-Gold Hamilton Masterpiece 23-Jewel Pocket Watch
Description: Exceptionally Rare 18K White-Gold Hamilton Masterpiece 12-Size 23-Jewel Gent’s Pocket WatchU.S.A. Hamilton (Pa.); Type: Man’s; Serial # 3,008,084; CA1937CASE: The 12-size open face No. 573368 18K white-gold case has a decorative monogram and is signed “Hamilton Watch Co.” DIAL: The silver ribbed pattern metal dial features Arabic numerals, Lancette hands and signed “Hamilton.”MOVT: This 23-jewel stem-set with No. 3,008,084 movement.CONDITIONS: C 3 (The case is in very good condition)D 3 (The dial is in very good condition)M 2 (The movement is in perfect condition)R 8-1/2 (Rarity on a scale of #1 being very common to #10 being extremely rare)Experts Opinion: Scarce and very rare in white gold. A true collectible! Fully marked masterpiece!
